recipes.title: Pancakes
recipes.instructions: Mix dry ingredients. Add wet ingredients and whisk until smooth. Cook on a hot griddle until bubbles form, then flip and cook until golden.

recipes.title: Guacamole
recipes.instructions: Mash avocados. Add chopped onion, tomato, and lime juice. Season with salt. Mix and serve fresh.
